Label.en: Do you know the joke about the owl and the guy who wears glasses?
Label.fr: Do you know the joke about the owl and the guy who wears glasses?
Label.es: Do you know the joke about the owl and the guy who wears glasses?
Label.zh: Do you know the joke about the owl and the guy who wears glasses?

Label.en: I kinda forgot how it goes...
Label.fr: I kinda forgot how it goes...
Label.es: I kinda forgot how it goes...
Label.zh: I kinda forgot how it goes...

Label.en: But you do wear glasses, right sir?
Label.fr: But you do wear glasses, right sir?
Label.es: But you do wear glasses, right sir?
Label.zh: But you do wear glasses, right sir?

Label.en: My cousin Alfred told me. He works in the Silicon Valley

Label.es: My cousin Alfred told me. He works in the Silicon Valley

Label.en: That's weird... my cousin Alfred told me you did... and he works in the Silicon Valley

Label.en: I thought those guys knew everything!
